header.content: A personal portfolio created to showcase my favorite projects and what I’ve been working on.

body.content: This is an exploration of modern web technologies in an effort to improve my understanding of how the world of web works and how we interact with it every day.

blocks.content:
A personal project.
A custom design.
My personal portfolio has gone through many iterations over the past few years,  each time taking a different approach to try and evoke a sense of my character.

Research conduced on successful design agencies and web developer portfolios guided each design iteration. Each design was produced with Adobe XD and focused modern design and simple user experiences. Here’s a few of past design iterations.
After further research of successful sites, I decided to take a step back and strip back the design to have only the essentials.

I understood the purpose of the site is to display case studies so these were placed so that they are the first thing the user experiences. I removed any non needed pages like dedicated contact and home pages and focused more on subtle animations and simplicity.
Looking at modern frameworks implementing React, Next.js was a clear winner because of its crazy efficient pre rendering tech, simple page routing and fast set up time.
